modules.description: Writes log messages to stderr with timestamps generated by a Mirage CLOCK. Processes log entries with severity levels and formatted messages. Used to instrument network applications with time-stamped debug and error outputs.

Processes command-line arguments and environment variables to configure logging thresholds, translating them into log source and level pairs. Works with threshold type, which represents log sources and their associated levels, and uses environment variables to override defaults. Configures the logging system by applying a list of thresholds, with optional default levels for unlisted sources.

Provides a logging reporter that writes messages to a formatter, including timestamps from a clock. Works with Format.formatter and Logs.reporter types to ensure reliable log delivery. Used in MirageOS unikernels to capture and output diagnostic information synchronously.
